title: EF Education-EasyPost Pins Flanders Hopes on Cobblestone Prince Neilson Powless and His Injury Return
content:
‘We just have to hope … He has the potential to win a monument.’ U.S. ace in race against time to prove fitness for ride with Alberto Bettiol at Tour of Flanders.

Read the full article at EF Education-EasyPost Pins Flanders Hopes on Cobblestone Prince Neilson Powless and His Injury Return on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
